mapper.sql: org_id, fitting_code, stock, count_way, type, is_new
mapper.select:
SELECT org.org_name AS orgName, stock.fitting_code AS fittingCode, detail.fitting_name AS fittingName, stock.stock AS stock, stock.count_way AS countWay, CONCAT( stock.stock + stock.count_way, '(', stock.stock, ')' ) AS availableStock, IFNULL((CASE WHEN stock.type = 0 THEN detail.cost WHEN stock.type = 1 THEN detail.branch_price WHEN stock.type = 2 THEN detail.network_price END),0) price, IFNULL((CASE WHEN stock.type = 0 THEN detail.cost * stock.stock WHEN stock.type = 1 THEN detail.branch_price * stock.stock WHEN stock.type = 2 THEN detail.network_price * stock.stock END),0) totalPrice, model.suit_model AS suitModel FROM hx_current_stock stock LEFT JOIN hx_fitting_detail detail ON stock.fitting_code = detail.fitting_code LEFT JOIN hx_organization org ON stock.org_id = org.org_code LEFT JOIN hx_fitting_model model ON detail.fitting_code = model.fitting_code WHERE 1=1
AND stock.type = #{param.specifiedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND org.org_name like CONCAT('%',#{param.orgName, jdbcType=FLOAT},'%')
AND detail.parts_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.partsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND modelsuit_model like CONCAT('%', #{param.suitModel, jdbcType=FLOAT}, '%')
AND stock.fitting_code like CONCAT('%', #{param.fittingCode, jdbcType=FLOAT}, '%')
AND detail.fitting_name like CONCAT('%', #{param.fittingName, jdbcType=FLOAT}, '%')
AND stock.is_new = #{param.isNew, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select org_id, fitting_code, IFNULL(stock,0) stock, count_way, type, is_new from hx_current_stock where org_id = #{orgId} and fitting_code = #{fittingCode} and is_new = #{isNew}
mapper.delete: delete from hx_current_stock where org_id = #{orgId} and fitting_code = #{fittingCode} and is_new = #{isNew}
